<Text: Football World, later renamed "Athletic World", was an American magazine devoted to the coverage of inter-collegiate sports.>

<Text: Football World:  Its masthead described it as "A Magazine With a Mission to Serve the College Man," a publication "devoted to Inter-collegiate Athletics and sports of Amateur standing only.">
